collectionId.description: The UUID of the collection associated with the document operation.

search.description: A search query string to filter documents.

take.description: The number of documents to retrieve. Must be a positive integer.

skip.description: The number of documents to skip for pagination. Must be a non-negative integer.

extended.description: Whether to retrieve extended information for the documents.

status.description: Filter by the overall job status.

nodes.description: Filter by the job status for layout nodes.

edges.description: Filter by the job status for edges.

vectors.description: Filter by the job status for vectors.

category.description: Filter by the job status for category.
